text:
Yes, but it’s not as useful as seeing the module in the real page.

In the design manger if you open a module you can click the preview button. This creates a live updating view of the module without any styles/javascript from a page.

When you save/upload the file the design manager preview will automatically update.

The same happens for template previews - but it doesn’t know about modules within the template changing so in that situation you’d need to manually refresh.
I've changed my theme name before no issues all of a sudden I change it and the header breaks. Any ideas why? I can't find any dependencies.
